entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
